text.value: Have you gone to the healthcare facility since your delivery for a postnatal care visit?
Afraid of a specific service provided at PNC
Bad previous experience (poor quality of care, treated badly)
Lack of partner support or permission to go
Not enough money for transport or paying for services and supplies
Why have you not attended any PNC visits?

I'd like to ask you a few questions about the quality of the services you received last time you went to the health facility. We will anonymously share this information with DHMT or other persons in the MOH so that they can improve the services that are provided. You can choose not to answer any question you don't want to. Is it ok for us to proceed?
Name: Age: years, months, days Contact person: House number: Kitongoji:
You're doing well and don't need to go to the health facility at this time.
To address an emergency postpartum danger sign
You need to go to the health facility for the following reasons:
To address a postpartum danger sign
Contact ID of the logged in user
Facility ID for the parent user
Name of the logged in user
If you haven't already, you should conduct the visit with 's baby after you finish her postpartum visit
How much do you know about health postparum nutrition? Can you describe what kinds of foods are good to eat at this time?
Please refer to card 2 of bango kitita to continue the discussion.

I would like to ask you a few questions that will help us improve the health services provided in your community in the future. You can decide you do not want to answer a question – just let me know if you prefer not to answer. Can we proceed?

You and your baby are required to attend the clinic for PNC services four times after your delivery as follows:
• Within 24 hours after your delivery • 3 days to 7 days after your delivery • 8 days to 28 days after your delivery • 29 days to 42 days after your delivery
Encouraging mother to attend the clinic for PNC services
First, I'm going to check for any postpartum danger signs.
You should go visit the health facility to get a checkup on your bleeding.
Is the client experiencing a lot of bleeding right now (3 or more pads from morning to midday)?
Begin by observing the mother and indicating if she has any of the following danger signs:

This is an URGENT and serious emergency. You should go to the nearest facility immediately. If it is near closing time for this facility, you should directly to nearest hospital.
I can help you arrange a driver to get to the health facility, but as I told you before that the program doesn't provide transport, so you are responsible for paying the full amount of the journey.
I will return in 3 days to make sure you completed this referral
If you have any problems before that time, please call me.
Discuss with client the advice she received for these conditions when she went to the facility including: Counseling, treatment, when to follow up. To be answered by the CHV
How is the condition of your caesarian section wound?
Based on your discussion do you think client needs to return to the facility for further checkup?

We've identified that you have a danger sign. Do not worry, because these conditions will be managed when you get to a health facilty.
Have you, in the past 3 days, gone to a health facility for any of these identified conditions?
Continue following the advice and treatment instructions you received at the health facility. If you condition worsens, return to the facility immediately.
No danger signs were identified, but if you develop any of the signs we discussed, you should go to a health facility immediately.

You should go to a health facility as soon as possible and within 24 hours for further screening.
I can help you arrange a driver to get to the health facility, but as I told you before that the program doesn't provide transport, so you are responsible for paying the full amount of the journey.
I will return in 3 days to make sure you completed this referral
If you have any problems before that time, please call me.
Indicate if the mother has any of the following non-emergency danger signs that require medical attention. Probe to understand if the condition requires medical attention:
Tenderness of the breast or cracked nipples
Pale pallor (note: look at client's palm and lip)
Severe pains in the muscles of the foot
Low urine output or leaking of urine
During your most recent Post-natal visit, which services did your baby receive?
Which district is the health facility located?
Where is the health facility located?
No, I didn't get a service
Yes, I got all the services at the faciltiy
Yes, I got some services but also had to go to another place as well for tests/invenstigations/other services.
Did you get the services at the facility you went to ?
I had no money to pay for the services
There was no regeants/tests at the faciltiy
The waiting time was too long. I decided to come back home.
Why did you not get the services?
During your most recent post-natal care visit, which services did you receive?
What did you go to the 2nd facility/pharmacy for?
What is the highest level of school your husband/partner has attended?
Please enter an age between 18 and 90
You and your husband/partner (or other family member) jointly
Who usually makes decisions about your health care? [Primary or ultimate decision-maker]
Does your (husband/partner) have other wives or does he live with other women as if married?
Please enter a value between 1 and 10.
Including you, in total, how many wives or live-in partners does your partner have?
Are you living together with your husband?
How do you typically travel from your home to the healthcare facility for routine/non-emergency visits?
Typically, how long does it take for you to travel from your home to the nearest healthcare facility for a routine/non-emergency visit?
Hi , I'd like to check up on you to see how you are doing following your delivery.
You and your husband/partner (or other family member) jointly
Yes, I got all the services at the faciltiy
Yes, I got some services but also had to go to another place as well for tests/invenstigations/other services.
No, I didn't get a service
Bad previous experience (poor quality of care, treated badly)
Afraid of a specific service provided at PNC
Not enough money for transport or paying for services and supplies
Lack of partner support or permission to go
There was no regeants/tests at the faciltiy
The waiting time was too long. I decided to come back home.
I had no money to pay for the services
Je ulishawahi kuhudhuria kliniki kwa ajili ya uchunguzi baada ya kujifungua?
Anaogopa huduma fulani inayotolewa kwa mama waliojifungua
Nilikosa ushirikiano na mwenza au sikupewa ruhusa ya kwenda
Sikua na pesa za kutosha kulipia usafiri, kulipa gharama za matibabu au kununua vifaa
Ni kwanini haujawahi kuhudhuria kliniki hata mara mmoja baada ya kujifungua?

Ningependa kukuuliza maswali machache kuhusu ubora wa huduma mara ya mwisho ulipoenda kwenda kituo cha afya.Tutawasilisha kwa siri taarifa hizi kwa timu ya afaya ya wilaya na baadhi ya watendaji wa wizara ya afya kwa ajili ya kuboresha huduma zinazotolewa.Ni sawa kutojibu swali ambalo huwezi kujibu. Je ni sawa kuendelea?
Huduma ya mama baada ya kujifungua kituo cha Afya
Tarehe ya mwisho ya tembeleo:
Jina: Umri: miaka, miezi, siku Mtu wa karibu kwa mawasiliano: Namba ya nyumba: Kitongoji:
Aina ya tembeleo: Tembeleo la mama mjamzito
Unaendelea vizuri na huhitaji kwenda kituo cha afya muda huu
Kushughulikia dalili za hatari za dharura baada ya kujifungua
Unahitaji kwenda kituo cha afya kwa sababu zifuatazo
Kushughulikia dalili za hatari baada ya kujifungua.
Punde tu utakapomaliza temebeleo la baada ya kujifungua, tafadhali endelea na tembeleo la mtoto ikiwa bado hujalifanya.
Ukumbusho wa kufanya tembeleo la mtoto
Kwa kiasi gani unaelewa kuhusu lishe baada ya kujifungua? Unaweza kunitajia aina za vyakula ambavyo ni vizuri kutumia kwenye kipindi hichi?
Tafadhali fungua ukurasa namba 2 kwenye bango kitita ili undelee na mazungumzo.
Ningependa kuuliza maswali machache yatayosaidia kuboresha hudumakatika jamii yako hapo baadae, unaweza kuamua kutojibu maswali, ni vizuri kunijulisha kama hutapenda kujibu, Je tunaweza kuendelea?

Unatakiwa kuhudhuria mara nne kliniki baada ya kujifungua kwaajili ya uchunguzi kwako pamoja na mtoto wako na mahudhurio ni haya:
• Ndani ya masaa 24 baada ya kujifungua • Siku ya 3 hadi ya siku ya 7 baada ya kujifungua • Siku ya 8 hadi siku ya 28 baada ya kujifungua • Siku 29 hadi siku ya 42 baada ya kujifungua
Kumhimiza mama kuhudhuria kituo cha afya baada ya kujifungua
Kwanza kabisa nitakuchunguza kam unadalili za hatari baada ya kujifungua
Inabidi uhudhurie kituo cha afya kwa ajili ya kufanyiwa uchunguzi juu ya kutoka damu nyingi
Je mteja anatokwa na damu nyingi hivi sasa? (Anatumia pedi au zaidi kutokea asubuhi mpaka mchana)
Anza kwa kumchunguza mama na onyesha kama ana dalili yeyote ya hatari kati ya hizi:
Hii ni dalili ya hatari ya dharura na inabidi upate msaada wa haraka.unahitaji kwenda kituo cha afya cha karibu haraka iwezekananyo,kama kitakua kimefungwa basi uende Hospitali yeyote ya karibu
Dalili za hatari baada ya kujifungua
Jadiliana na mteja juu ya ushauri aliopatiwa kituo cha afya kwa tatizo lake,ushauri,huduma na ufatiliaji Usimsomee, jaza wewe
Vipi hali ya mshono/kidonda chako cha operesheni?
Kwa kuzingatia majadiliano yako na mteja, unadhani mteja anahitaji kurudi kituo cha afya kwa ajili ya uchunguzi zaidi?

Tumegundua kuwa una dalili hatarishi,usipate wasiwasi,kwa sababu hali hii itapatiwa ufumbuzi pindi tu ukienda kituo cha afya, Je ulishawahi kuhudhuria kituo cha afya kwa tatizo hili siku tatu zilizopita?
Tafadhali endelea kufuata ushauri na maelekezo ya matibabu uliyopatiwa kituo cha afya, kama hali yako itazidi kuwa mbaya, rudi kituo cha afya haraka.
Hakuna dalili za hatari zilizogundulika,iwapo utaona dalili yeyote kati zile tulizojadili, basi wahi kituo cha afya haraka.
Tafadhalihudhuria kituo cha afya haraka iwezekanavyo.
Onyesha kama mama ana dalili ya hatari isiyo ya dharura inahitaji msaada wa kitibabu, Hoji kujua kama mama anahitaji msaada zaidi:
Kukakamaa kwa matiti au chuchu zilizopasuka
Mpauko/kupiga rangi (Angalia: viganja na mdomo ya mama)
Kuumwa sana kichwa sehemu ya mbele
Kuumwa san tumbo sehemu ya chini
Kutoa mkojo kidogo au kuvuja kwa mkojo
Harufu mbaya au isyoyakawaida sehemu za siri
Dalili nyengine za hatari baada ya kujifungua
Kuelekezwa mbinu za unyonyeshaji (Jinsi ya kumpakata na kumueka mtoto katika matiti)
Kuangaliwa uchangamfu wa baadhi ya viungo.
Hakuna kati ya hao hapo juu.
Huwezi kuchaguwa "Hakuna moja wapo" na chaguo jengine
Ulipoenda kliniki baada ya kujifungua kwa mara ya mwisho, Mtoto wako alipewa huduma gani?
Ulienda kituo gani kupata huduma za baada ya kujifungua?
Ndio, nilipata huduma zote katika kituo cha afya.
Ndio, nilipata baadhi ya huduma lakini nilienda kituo cha afya kingine kufanaya vipimo
Je ulipata huduma katika kituo ulichotembelea?
Nilikuwa sina pesa za kulipia huduma.
Kulikuwa hakuna vifaa vya kufanyia vipimo katika kituo cha afya.
Nilisubiri muda mrefu sana. Nikaamuwa nirudi bila kupata huduma.
Hakuna kati ya hao hapo juu.
Huwezi kuchaguwa "Hakuna moja wapo" na chaguo jengine
Ulipoenda kliniki baada ya kujifungua kwa mara ya mwisho, Ulipata huduma gani?
Dawa za kuongeza damu kwa mama wajawazito.
Je ulienda kwajili ya huduma gani kituo (Cha pili)?
Hakumaliza/ kapata elimu ya nasari kaishia darasa la tano.
Hakumaliza elimu ya secondari kaishia darasa la kumi na moja
Elimu yake zaidi ya elimu ya juu/ zaidi ya kidatu cha sita
Kamalizia elimu ya msingi (darasa la sita)
Kaliza darasa la kumi na mbili
Ni kiwango gani cha elimu mume/mwenza amehitimu?
Ni upi umri wa mwenza wako?
Ulifuatana na mume/mweza wako (or wanafamilia wengine)
Kwa kawaida ni nani huwa anafanya maamuzi kuhusu afya yako? (maamuzi Makuu na ya msingi)
Je ni ipi hali yako ya ndoa?
Je mwenza wa mama huyu ana wake wengine/wenzaambao wanaishi pamoja?
Ukijumuisha na wewe, kwa pamoja mume wako ana wenza wangapi?
Unatumia usafiri gani kutoka nyumbani kwenda kituo cha afya kwa huduma za kawaida zisizo za dharura?
Kati ya dakika 30 na saa mmoja
Kikawaida, Inachukua muda gani kusafiri kutokea nyumbani kwenda kituo cha afya cha karibu kwa ajili ya huduma za kawaida zisizo za dharura?
Habari , ningependa kukuangalia na kujua maendeleo yako baada ya kujifungua.
Hospitali ya wilaya ya Chake Chake
Hospitali ya wilaya ya Abdallah Mzee
Kuangaliwa uchangamfu wa baadhi ya viungo.
Kuelekezwa mbinu za unyonyeshaji (Jinsi ya kumpakata na kumueka mtoto katika matiti)
Hakuna kati ya hao hapo juu.
Ulifuatana na mume/mweza wako (or wanafamilia wengine)
Hakumaliza/ kapata elimu ya nasari kaishia darasa la tano.
Kamalizia elimu ya msingi (darasa la sita)
Hakumaliza elimu ya secondari kaishia darasa la kumi na moja
Kaliza darasa la kumi na mbili
Elimu yake zaidi ya elimu ya juu/ zaidi ya kidatu cha sita
Ndio, nilipata huduma zote katika kituo cha afya.
Ndio, nilipata baadhi ya huduma lakini nilienda kituo cha afya kingine kufanaya vipimo
Hakumaliza/ kapata elimu ya nasari kaishia darasa la tano.
Kamalizia elimu ya msingi (darasa la sita)
Hakumaliza elimu ya secondari kaishia darasa la kumi na moja
Kaliza darasa la kumi na mbili
Elimu yake zaidi ya elimu ya juu/ zaidi ya kidatu cha sita
Hakuna kati ya hao hapo juu.
Anaogopa huduma fulani inayotolewa kwa mama waliojifungua
Sikua na pesa za kutosha kulipia usafiri, kulipa gharama za matibabu au kununua vifaa
Nilikosa ushirikiano na mwenza au sikupewa ruhusa ya kwenda
Dawa za kuongeza damu kwa mama wajawazito.
Kulikuwa hakuna vifaa vya kufanyia vipimo katika kituo cha afya.
Nilisubiri muda mrefu sana. Nikaamuwa nirudi bila kupata huduma.
Nilikuwa sina pesa za kulipia huduma.
Kati ya dakika 30 na saa mmoja
